welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Padiham, a charming town known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We are delighted to have you here and invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Warton Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport is used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport is primarily used for cargo and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackpool Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal with a wide range of shops, restaurants, and services.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used by low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration.
